ad_text: MountainTransport Institute Ltd. Sponsored We are looking for a Log Truck Driver to run a Super-B doing on-highway transfers from sort yards to the Mercer Celgar Pulp Mill at the edge of Castlegar, BC. Logs are picked up from Lumby, Revelstoke, Yahk, OK Falls and Midway - depending on where we are needed. This driver must possess the ability to self-manage their time and let us know when the vehicles require repair, so that we can keep it safe and legal for you. Looking after your dedicated equipment, driving for fuel economy and hauling full legal loads are all requirements of this job. A Class 1 Driver's License, plus Mountain and Winter driving experience is required. The truck runs 5 days per week on day shift - if you are looking for long term stable employment this is the job you have been waiting for. Benefits are available after 90 days. Please apply with your resume and "N" print (aka Commercial) driver’s abstract. If you are looking for part time or fill-in work - please do apply, as we may have something else for you to do or may be able to set up a job share arrangement.
